vistra.framework.traversal.step

Interface IStep

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICommand
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStep, BackEdgeStep, CrossEdgeStep, DiscardedEdgeStep, ForwardEdgeStep, InitializedVertexStep, SolutionMemberStep, UpdatedVertexStep, VisitStep

    public interface IStep
extends ICommand
    A step interface. A step is an extended ICommand and part of a traversal.
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
